name: Dogfight (itch) (Stephens Clan Gaming)
description:
You are a fighter ace on a mission to destroy all opposition. Fly and fight your way through 12 levels, with enemies ranging from monoplanes to tanks to fighter jets. Unlock planes as you advance, or for the enterprising, figure out the cheat code!

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move your selector, and enter to select. Ctrl+Space to bomb. All other controls can be found in the in-game tutorial.
